alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marinette County through 830 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Pembine, or 20 miles south of Kingsford, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausaukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County
